lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We always thought they would offer a settlement to staff here in keeping with their image as an equal opportunity employer," said a senior black employee, adding "We had no idea that the age of slavery was still alive."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This could threaten the divestment plan, say industry sources, since most of the purchase price, as Ball said, is for employee skills and expertise and not assets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: First National Bank's managing director, Chris Ball, said his bank was essentially buying the skills of Citibank's specialist employees and disclosed that the American bank's assets in South Africa totalled only 15 mln rand.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This could threaten the divestment plan, say industry sources, since most of the purchase price, as Ball said, is for employee skills and expertise and not assets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: First National Bank's managing director, Chris Ball, said his bank was essentially buying the skills of Citibank's specialist employees and disclosed that the American bank's assets in South Africa totalled only 15 mln rand.
